hero.title: All your resources
hero.subtitle: Simplify your daily life with an innovative platform. Find, organize, and access resources easily and efficiently.
hero.paragraph: Simplify your daily life with an innovative platform. Find, organize, and access resources easily and efficiently.

cardsSection.title: Discover your next favorite resource
cardsSection.paragraph: More than just a tool, an inspiration source

intro.text: At RoosterTools, we believe that the key to being more productive is having everything you need at your fingertips. Whether you are a programmer or a designer, our platform allows you to save, organize, and access your favorite resources easily without overloading your browser bookmarks.
